title.value: Economic efficiency of nitrogen fertilizers use on winter and spring rape
Экономическая эффективность азотных удобрений на посевах озимого и ярового рапса

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Bulavin, L.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied the problems of use of nitrogen fertilizers on winter and spring rape (Brassica napus) crops, economic efficiency of fertilizer application on sod-podzolic soils, the effect of increasing doses of nitrogen fertilizers on the yield of winter and spring rape oilseeds. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in 2011-2012. As a result of realized research it was revealed that on middle-cultivated sod-podzolic light loamy soil the highest economic effect was reached at using of nitrogen dose of N200 in two doses on winter rape, and N160 in two doses - on spring rape. The influence of nitrogen fertilizers on the crop yield of winter and spring oilseed rape, calculation of operating costs for the cultivation of winter rape, calculation of production costs on the cultivation of winter and spring rape were presented.
